headline: Did Analyst Praise and Cash-Flow Strength Just Shift Monolithic Power Systems' (MPWR) Investment Narrative?
summary: Recently, Citi highlighted Monolithic Power Systems (MPWR) as a top semiconductor pick, citing its strength in enterprise data and data center power-management markets, while separate analysis emphasized its approximately 27% annual revenue growth over the past five years and improved free cash flow margins. This combination of positive analyst attention and evidence of efficient cash generation underscores how Monolithic Power Systems is increasingly viewed as a key beneficiary of...
